participant_1.name: Alex Carter
participant_1.personality: Driven and passionate, Alex is determined to make a difference in the world through medicine while also embracing the joy of performing.
participant_1.background: I value my car because it allows me to be independent and travel wherever I want. I am in medical school. I work in a circus as a juggler. I am an international businessman. I like reading.

participant_2.name: Jordan Lee
participant_2.personality: Creative and adventurous, Jordan loves exploring new ideas and finding inspiration in everyday life to help others.
participant_2.background: I like to eat at the local diner when I'm studying for my master's degree. I want to be an explorer. I am a professional bowler who overcame a broken arm to achieve my dream. Last year, I found inspiration in the world and used it to help my clients with their taxes. I spend my free time tinkering with new cellphone app ideas.

content.text: Not bad! I'm in medical school right now and also a juggler in a circus.
That sounds like a lot! What made you want to juggle?
I wanted to be an explorer when I was younger, and I thought juggling would help with my coordination.
That's a cool reason! How do you like medical school?
It's a lot of work, but it's also really rewarding. I love helping people and learning new things.
That's great! What are you most looking forward to after medical school?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm excited to find out!
I'm sure you'll do great things!
No problem! So, what are you doing this weekend?
I'm not sure yet. I might go to the movies or read a book.
That sounds like a good plan. I'm going to spend my weekend tinkering with some new cellphone app ideas.
That sounds cool! I'm not very good with technology, but I'm always impressed by what people can do with it.
Thanks! It's not too hard to learn, and it's a lot of fun.
I might have to try it out sometime.
You should! It's a great way to learn new things and make new friends.
Thanks for the suggestion! I will.
